title: Another typographic band, from Canada
content: Mr Hudson will like this one… Saturday July 15 - And now for something completely different: From farrrr out in left field comes a hec-lectic night with Ottawa’s electro-frantic noisepunks Daiquiri, Wolverine (featuring members of Ninja High School, Pyramid Culture, & Pony Cops), Hard Love In Times New Roman (a “font concept band” ?!? with members of Gastric Female Reflex), and A Million Crying Baby Lions. At The Press Club (850 Dundas West), 8pm, $5, ALL AGES [http://blogto.com/music/2006/07/hot\_ticket\_for\_the\_week\_of\_july\_10\_july\_16/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060716120941/http:/blogto.com/music/2006/07/hot_ticket_for_the_week_of_july_10_july_16/)
author: sii

comments.content: Thank goodness they’re not _Hard Love In ITC Garamond._

I guess names of bands have grown in length, complexity, and eclecticism since I last paid attention (“For the Times, they are a changin’”). I’ll bet their sound is letter-perfect though.

ChrisL
And to think I was down there last weekend and not this weekend.
